00016 #if !defined(__AUDACITY_FFMPEG__)
00017 #define __AUDACITY_FFMPEG__
00018 
00019 /* FFmpeg is written in C99. It uses many types from stdint.h. Because we are
00020  * compiling this using a C++ compiler we have to put it in extern "C".
00021  * __STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS is defined to make <stdint.h> behave like it
00022  * is actually being compiled with a C99 compiler.
00023  *
00024  * The symptoms are that INT64_C is not a valid type, which tends to break
00025  * somewhere down in the implementations using this file */
00026 
00027 /* In order to be able to compile this file when ffmpeg is not available we
00028  * need access to the value of USE_FFMPEG, which means config*.h needs to come
00029  * in before this file. The suggest way to achieve this is by including
00030  * Audacity.h */
00031 
00032 #if defined(USE_FFMPEG)
00033 extern "C" {
00034    // Include errno.h before the ffmpeg includes since they depend on 
00035    // knowing the value of EINVAL...see bottom of avcodec.h.  Not doing
00036    // so will produce positive error returns when they should be < 0.
00037    #include <errno.h>
00038 
00039    #include <libavcodec/avcodec.h>
00040    #include <libavformat/avformat.h>
00041    #include <libavutil/fifo.h>
00042 }
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #include "Audacity.h"
00046 /* rather earlier than normal, but pulls in config*.h and other program stuff
00047  * we need for the next bit */
00048 #include <wx/string.h>
00049 #include <wx/dynlib.h>
00050 #include <wx/log.h>        // for wxLogNull
00051 #include <wx/msgdlg.h>     // for wxMessageBox
00052 #include <wx/utils.h>
00053 #include "../widgets/LinkingHtmlWindow.h"
00054 #include "FileDialog.h"
00055 #include "ShuttleGui.h"
00056 #include "../Prefs.h"
00057 #include <wx/checkbox.h>
00058 #include <wx/textctrl.h>
00059 
00060 // if you needed them, any other audacity header files would go here
00061 
00062 /* These defines apply whether or not ffmpeg is available */
00063 #define INITDYN(w,f) if ((*(void**)&this->f=(void*)w->GetSymbol(wxT(#f))) == NULL) { wxLogMessage(wxT("Failed to load symbol ") wxT(#f)); return false; };
00064 
00067 void av_log_wx_callback(void* ptr, int level, const char* fmt, va_list vl);

00074 /* from here on in, this stuff only applies when ffmpeg is available */
00075 #if defined(USE_FFMPEG)
00076 
00077 /* This is a bit shortsighted (matches only 0.5 exactly), but i can't come up with anything smarter at the moment */
00078 #if LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MAJOR == 52 && LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MINOR == 31 && LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MAJOR == 52 && LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MINOR == 20
00079 #define FFMPEG_STABLE 1
00080 #else
00081 #define FFMPEG_STABLE 0
00082 #endif

00101 class FFmpegNotFoundDialog : public wxDialog
00102 {
00103 public:
00104 
00105    FFmpegNotFoundDialog(wxWindow *parent)
00106       :  wxDialog(parent, wxID_ANY, wxString(_("FFmpeg not found")))
00107    {
00108       ShuttleGui S(this, eIsCreating);
00109       PopulateOrExchange(S);
00110    }
00111 
00112    void PopulateOrExchange(ShuttleGui & S)
00113    {
00114       wxString text;
00115 
00116       S.SetBorder(10);
00117       S.StartVerticalLay(true);
00118       {
00119          S.AddFixedText(_(
00120 "Audacity attempted to use FFmpeg to import an audio file,\n\
00121 but the libraries were not found.\n\n\
00122 To use FFmpeg import, go to Preferences > Libraries\n\
00123 to download or locate the FFmpeg libraries."
00124          ));
00125 
00126          int dontShowDlg = 0;
00127          gPrefs->Read(wxT("/FFmpeg/NotFoundDontShow"),&dontShowDlg,0);
00128          mDontShow = S.AddCheckBox(_("Do not show this warning again"),dontShowDlg ? wxT("true") : wxT("false"));
00129 
00130          S.AddStandardButtons(eOkButton);
00131       }
00132       S.EndVerticalLay();
00133 
00134       Layout();
00135       Fit();
00136       SetMinSize(GetSize());
00137       Center();
00138 
00139       return;
00140    }
00141 
00142    void OnOk(wxCommandEvent & event)
00143    {
00144       if (mDontShow->GetValue())
00145       {
00146          gPrefs->Write(wxT("/FFmpeg/NotFoundDontShow"),1);
00147       }
00148       this->EndModal(0);
00149    }
00150 
00151 private:
00152 
00153    wxCheckBox *mDontShow;
00154 
00155    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00156 };

00270    wxString GetLibraryVersion()
00271    {
00272       return wxString::Format(wxT("F(%s),C(%s),U(%s)"),mAVFormatVersion.c_str(),mAVCodecVersion.c_str(),mAVUtilVersion.c_str());
00273    }

00275 #if defined(__WXMSW__)
00276    /* Library names and file filters for Windows only */
00277 
00278    wxString GetLibraryTypeString()
00279    {
00280       return _("Only avformat.dll|*avformat*.dll|Dynamically Linked Libraries (*.dll)|*.dll|All Files (*.*)|*");
00281    }
00282 
00283    wxString GetLibAVFormatPath()
00284    {
00285       wxRegKey reg(wxT("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\Software\\FFmpeg for Audacity"));
00286       wxString path;
00287 
00288       if (reg.Exists()) {
00289          reg.QueryValue(wxT("InstallPath"), path);
00290       }
00291 
00292       return path;
00293    }
00294 
00295    wxString GetLibAVFormatName()
00296    {
00297       return (wxT("avformat-") wxT(AV_STRINGIFY(LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MAJOR)) wxT(".dll"));
00298    }
00299 
00300    wxString GetLibAVCodecName()
00301    {
00302       return (wxT("avcodec-") wxT(AV_STRINGIFY(LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MAJOR)) wxT(".dll"));
00303    }
00304 
00305    wxString GetLibAVUtilName()
00306    {
00307       return (wxT("avutil-") wxT(AV_STRINGIFY(LIBAVUTIL_VERSION_MAJOR)) wxT(".dll"));
00308    }
00309 #elif defined(__WXMAC__)
00310    /* Library names and file filters for Mac OS only */
00311    wxString GetLibraryTypeString()
00312    {
00313       return _("Dynamic Libraries (*.dylib)|*.dylib|All Files (*)|*");
00314    }
00315 
00316    wxString GetLibAVFormatPath()
00317    {
00318       return wxT("/usr/local/lib/audacity");
00319    }

00322    {
00323       return (wxT("libavformat.") wxT(AV_STRINGIFY(LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MAJOR)) wxT(".dylib"));
00324    }

00334    }
00335 #else
00336    /* Library names and file filters for other platforms, basically Linux and
00337    * other *nix platforms */
00338    wxString GetLibraryTypeString()
00339    {
00340       return _("Only libavformat.so|libavformat.so*|Dynamically Linked Libraries (*.so*)|*.so*|All Files (*)|*");
00341    }
00342 
00343    wxString GetLibAVFormatPath()
00344    {
00345       return wxT("");
00346    }

00350       return (wxT("libavformat.so.") wxT(AV_STRINGIFY(LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MAJOR)));
00351    }
00352
